sources.title: Bosko in Person
sources.description: Title: Bosko in Person Summary: Bosko and Honey perform a wacky stage act that includes doing imitations of Maurice Chevalier , Greta Garbo and 'Jimmy Durante'. Directed by: Friz Freleng, Hugh Harman Actors: Release Date: 11 February 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Bosko and Honey perform a wacky stage act that includes doing imitations of

metadata.Plot: Bosko and Honey perform a wacky stage act that includes doing imitations of Maurice Chevalier, Greta Garbo and Jimmy Durante. Singing, dancing and piano playing are the order of the day. Bosko's anthropomorphic glove even gets in on the act by reciting "Mary Had a Little Lamb." If the performance can be said to have a flaw, it's that Bosko gets a little carried away while dancing, making it no surprise when he finally falls off the stage.
metadata.Actors: Ken Darby, Rochelle Hudson, Rudolf Ising
